ygData.subject: Re: Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: I think this is what your looking for... Crude Stein:+10 Stamina, +15 Charisma. Minor healing effect. All Classes. Found on Ogre Bouncers (Guards) in Feerrott.
ygData.messageBody:
I think this is what your looking for...

Crude Stein:+10 Stamina, +15 Charisma.
Minor healing effect.
All Classes.
Found on Ogre Bouncers (Guards) in Feerrott.

-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi [mailto:kaleusi@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 2:16 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Crude Stein


From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>

I've been questing for a Crude Stein for approximately 1 month now, and I've

still yet to find one. Does anyone know for sure where you can get one, or
which quest you can get them from? I'm even willing to buy one from someone
(on the Bertoxxulous server) and will discuss the price if you have one for
sale.
